text: napurak kirīma kisima nabivarayekuṭa ayat dæyak nova. kavurun hō napurak kaḷahot ohu ema napura kaḷa vastuvada, viniścaya dinadī (taman samaga) gena ennaṭa sidu vanu æta. pasuva sǣma ātmayakaṭama (ē) ē dæya kaḷa pāpayanṭa (sarilana phalavipāka) pūraṇa vaśayen denu læbē. ēvā (kaḷa pin aḍu kara hō pāpayan væḍi kara hō) asādhāraṇayak karanu nolæbē
